meta.description: Get our free email newsletter at http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Is mercury mostly absent from most vaccines? If that is the case, is there nothing more to worry about? Neil Miller has done extensive research on the topic and he says there is a bigger problem than mercury. Find out why and what this problem might lead to when it comes to your and your child's health!

title: This is a Bigger Problem Than Mercury in Vaccines!
cleaned_text:
Get our free email newsletter at http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter

Is mercury mostly absent from most vaccines? If that is the case, is there nothing more to worry about? Neil Miller has done extensive research on the topic and he says there is a bigger problem than mercury. Find out why and what this problem might lead to when it comes to your and your child's health!
